# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Python Amazon parser

Відповідь: Amazon Parser is a software program that allows users to search for and collect data from Amazon websites. It enables users to find product details such as product categories, shipping details, images, reviews, price, etc. from Amazon. With Amazon Parser, users can search for multiple products and organize the results in a desired way. It also allows users to extract product data like prices, descriptions, reviews, etc. from the Amazon website and store it in a database. This allows users to make informed decisions while purchasing. Amazon Parser also enables users to research competitive products, identify deals, and track prices.
